description:
Ko-o forces sick Korin to put a Hinman spirit in Sugimoto to kill Yoko.  The group of Shu-Sei kindly asks Yoko to take the ship to En with them, but Yoko chooses not to, so she won’t put them in trouble.  Kotetsu, once the critic of Yoko in the group, saw Yoko’s hardwork and prepares another ship for her to catch up with the group.  Sugimoto finds Yoko but she is surprised how much Yoko has changed.  Sugimoto and Yoko let their feelings out in battle.  Then a sea monster attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shadow of the Moon, The Sea of Shadow - Chapter 8
Tsuki no Kage, Kage no Umi - Hachi Shou
月の影 影の海 八章
